outputs.output_descr: A Capacity Building to help jump-start the implementation of the Country Programme Action Plan (CPAP) in 13 of the 36 States of the federation.  The project would enable partners to address and fund a number of essential capacity development initiatives that are beyond the boundaries of the core sectoral programmes  specifically in such areas of ensuring quality and effectiveness of programme delivery; high quality advisory services, strategic policy research and analysis; gender issues and capacity development, as well as monitoring and evaluation for mutual accountability and programme communication.

project_descr: The project is designed to provide capacity development support to CPAP implementing partners that is unlikely to be properly addressed and funded.
project_title: Capacity Development Project for Successful CPAP Impleme
